info.name: Reduced Width Header
info.description:
Shrinks Tumblr's header to about the width of the dashboard.

Works wherever the header exists on Tumblr.
info.additionalInfo:
January 22, 2017:
  • Increase the width of the header to match the new width of the full dashboard (990px).

February 9, 2016:
  • Dramatically reduce the amount of CSS & bring up to parity with New XKit's most recent reduced width header code.
May 7, 2015:
  • Initial Release.
